name: Fidget Spinner VR
description:
Rotate the universe with your spinner  👽🖖✨

Controls: Press the trigger and rotate the spinner with your controller.  

The whole thing was made in 4 hours. Should work on Oculus and Vive but I tested only on vive. kek. Spinner model by @vereshchagindmitry. Follow me on twitter for more VR magic @vladstorm_

#FidgetSpinner
